data.title: Mountain View Public Library
data.text:
On August 28, between 8 a.m. and 12 p.m., the Library catalog will be offline for about one hour. You will still be able to search, but some functions like placing holds and renewing checkouts will be unavailable. We apologize for the inconvenience and will remove this message when the maintenance is complete.

Invalid Record

Sorry, we could not find a record with an id of kan1114603%3FsearchId%3D4239742%26recordIndex%3D2%26page%3D1%26referred%3DresultIndex in our catalog. Please try your search again.
